info.title: Digital CMR APIs
info.description: APIs for managing the digital CMR

post.description: The user logs into the system and gets back user metadata an auth x-access-token

200.description: The user has successfully logged in

post.description: Creates a new transportOrder and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the right permissions.

200.description: The Transport Order has been created and written to the blockchain

get.summary: Return the complete list of Transport Orders
get.description: Returns the complete list of Transport Orders which the current user has the right to read

200.description: The list of Transport Orders is returned

get.summary: Return the Transport Order selected by ID
get.description: Returns the Transport Order that is selected by ID

parameters.name: orderID
parameters.description: Unique orderID of the Transport Order

200.description: The list contains the Transport Order. It is empty if a Transport Order with the provided orderID does not exist, or if the user does not have permission to read the Transport Order

get.summary: Return the Transport Order selected by status
get.description: Returns the Transport Order selected by status

200.description: The list contains the Transport Order(s) by status. It is empty if a Transport Order with the provided status does not exist, or if the user does not have permission to read the Transport Order

get.summary: Return the Transport Order selected by VIN
get.description: Returns the Transport Order selected by VIN

parameters.name: vin
parameters.description: Provide the VIN that is used to make a selection of TransportOrders

200.description: The list contains the Transport Order(s) by VIN. It is empty if a Transport Order with the provided VIN does not exist, or if the user does not have permission to read the Transport Order

put.summary: Update the Pickup Window of an existing TransportOrder
put.description: Updates the Pickup Window of an existing transportOrder and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the proper permissions.

parameters.name: TransportOrder
parameters.description: Updates the TransportOrder object with the Pickup Window

200.description: The TransportOrder has been updated and written to the blockchain

put.summary: Update the Delivery Window of an existing TransportOrder
put.description: Updates the Delivery Window of an existing TransportOrder and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the proper permissions.

200.description: The TransportOrder has been updated and written to the blockchain

put.summary: Update the status of an existing TransportOrder to cancelled
put.description: Updates the status of an existing TransportOrder to cancelled and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the proper permissions.

200.description: The TransportOrder has been updated and written to the blockchain

post.description: Creates new ECMR(s) and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the proper permissions.

200.description: The ECMR has been created and written to the blockchain

get.summary: Return the complete list of ECMRs
get.description: Returns the complete list of ECMRs, which the current user is allowed to read

200.description: The list of ECMRs is returned

put.summary: Update the status of an existing ECMR to LOADED
put.description: Updates the status of an existing ECMR to LOADED and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the proper permissions.

200.description: The ECMR has been updated and written to the blockchain

put.summary: Update the status of an existing ECMR to IN_TRANSIT
put.description: Updates the status of an existing ECMR to IN_TRANSIT and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the proper permissions.

200.description: The ECMR has been updated and written to the blockchain

put.summary: Update the status of an existing ECMR to DELIVERED
put.description: Updates the status of an existing ECMR to DELIVERED and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the proper permissions.

200.description: The ECMR has been updated and written to the blockchain

put.summary: Update the status of an existing ECMR to CONFIRMED_DELIVERED
put.description: Updates the status of an existing ECMR to CONFIRMED_DELIVERED and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the proper permissions.

200.description: The ECMR has been updated and written to the blockchain

get.summary: Return an ECMR selected by ID
get.description: Returns an ECMR selected by ID

parameters.name: ecmrID
parameters.description: The unique ID of an ECMR

200.description: It will return the ECMR object. It is empty if an ECMR with the provided ID does not exist, or if the user has no permission to read the ECMR

get.summary: Return the ECMR selected by status
get.description: Returns the ECMR selected by status

200.description: The list contains the ECMR(s) by status. It is empty if an ECMR with the provided status does not exist, or if the user has no permission to read the ECMR

get.summary: Return the ECMRs containing a vehicle with the provided vin
get.description: Returns the ECMRs containing a vehicle with the provided vin

200.description: The list contains the ECMRs containing a vehicle with the provided vin. It is empty if a vehicle with the provided vin does not exist, or if the user has no permission to read them

get.summary: Return the ECMRs containing a vehicle with the provided plateNumber
get.description: Returns the ECMRs containing a vehicle with the provided plateNumber

200.description: The list contains the ECMRs containing a vehicle with the provided plateNumber. It is empty if a vehicle with the plateNumber does not exist or if the user has no permission to read them

put.summary: Update an existing ECMR to cancelled
put.description: Updates an existing ECMR to cancelled and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the right permissions.

200.description: The ECMR has been cancelled and written to the blockchain

put.summary: Update an existing ECMR with the Expected Pickup Window
put.description: Updates an existing ECMR with the Expected Pickup Window and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the right permissions.

200.description: The ECMR has been updated with the Expected Pickup Window and written to the blockchain

put.summary: Update an existing ECMR with the Expected Delivery Window
put.description: Updates an existing ECMR with the Expected Delivery Window and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the right permissions.

200.description: The ECMR has been updated with the Expected Delivery Window and written to the blockchain

post.description: Creates a new Legal Owner and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the right permissions.

200.description: The Legal Owner has been created and written to the blockchain

get.summary: Return the complete list of Legal Owners
get.description: Returns the complete list of Legal Owners, which the current user has the right to read

200.description: The Legal Owner has been found.

get.summary: Return the Legal Owner Organization selected by ID
get.description: Returns the Legal Owner Organization selected by ID

200.description: The Legal Owner has been found and is returned.

get.summary: Return the Legal Owner Organization selected by name
get.description: Returns the Legal Owner Organization selected by name

200.description: The Legal Owner has been found and is returned.

post.description: Creates a new Compound Organization and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the right permissions.

200.description: The Compound organization has been created and written to the blockchain

get.summary: Return the complete list of Compound Organizations
get.description: Returns the complete list of Legal Owners, which the current user has the right to read

200.description: The Compound organization has been found.

get.summary: Return the Compound Organization selected by ID
get.description: Returns the Compound Organization selected by ID

200.description: The Compound has been found and is returned.

get.summary: Return the Compound Organization selected by name
get.description: Returns the Compound Organization selected by name

200.description: The Compound has been found and is returned.

post.description: Creates a new Carrier org and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the right permissions.

200.description: The Carrier organization has been created and written to the blockchain

get.summary: Return the complete list of Carrier Organizations
get.description: Returns the complete list of all Carriers, which the current user has the right to read

200.description: The Carrier organization has been found.

get.summary: Return the Carrier Organization selected by ID
get.description: Returns the Carrier Organization selected by ID

200.description: The Carrier has been found and is returned.

get.summary: Return the Carrier Organization selected by name
get.description: Returns the Carrier Organization selected by name

200.description: The Carrier has been found and is returned.

post.description: Creates a new Recipient organization and saves it to the blockchain, if the user has the right permissions.

200.description: The Recipient organization has been created and written to the blockchain

get.summary: Return the complete list of Recipient Organizations
get.description: Returns the complete list of Recipients, which the current user has the right to read

200.description: The Recipient organization has been found.

get.summary: Return the Recipient Organization selected by ID
get.description: Returns the Recipient Organization selected by ID

200.description: The Recipient has been found and is returned.

get.summary: Return the Recipient Organization selected by name
get.description: Returns the Recipient Organization selected by name

200.description: The Recipient has been found and is returned.

post.summary: Create a set of vehicles from a list
post.description: Creates a set of vehicles from a list, if the user has the right permissions.

200.description: The vehicles have been created and written into the blockchain

get.summary: Return the complete list of vehicles
get.description: Returns the complete list of vehicles, which the current user has the right to read

200.description: The vehicles list is returned

get.summary: Return the vehicle containing the provided vin
get.description: Returns the vehicle containing the provided vin

200.description: The vehicles is returned

get.summary: Return the vehicle containing the provided plateNumber
get.description: Returns the vehicle containing the provided plateNumber

200.description: The vehicle is returned

post.summary: Create a new participant and issue an identity on the blockchain
post.description: Creates a new participant, issues an identity on the blockchain and a new user for the app server

200.description: The participant(s) have been created and written to the blockchain

get.summary: Return the list of the Legal Owner Admins
get.description: Returns the list of the Legal Owner Admins

200.description: The list of Legal Owner Admins is returned

get.summary: Return the Legal Owner Admin with the specified userID
get.description: Returns the Legal Owner Admin with the specified userID

200.description: The Legal Owner Admin is returned

get.summary: Return the list of Legal Owner Admins who are part of the specified organization
get.description: Returns the list of Legal Owner Admins who are part of the specified organization

200.description: The Legal Owner Admins are returned

get.summary: Return the list of CompoundAdmins
get.description: Returns the list of CompoundAdmins

200.description: The list of CompoundAdmins is returned

get.summary: Return the Compound Admin with the specified userID
get.description: Returns the Compound Admin with the specified userID

200.description: The Legal Owner Admin is returned

get.summary: Return the list of Compound Admins who are part of the specified organization
get.description: Returns the list of Compound Admins who are part of the specified organization

200.description: The Compound Admins are returned

get.summary: Return the list of Carrier Members
get.description: Returns the list of Carrier Members

200.description: The list of Carrier Members is returned

get.summary: Return the Carrier Member with the specified userID
get.description: Returns the Carrier Member with the specified userID

200.description: The Carrier Member is returned

get.summary: Return the list of Carrier Members who are part of the specified organization
get.description: Returns the list of Carrier Members who are part of the specified organization

200.description: The Carrier Members are returned

get.summary: Return the list of Carrier Admins
get.description: Returns the list of Carrier Admins

200.description: The list of Carrier Admins is returned

get.summary: Return the Carrier Admin with the specified userID
get.description: Returns the Carrier Admin with the specified userID

200.description: The Carrier Admin is returned

get.summary: Return the list of Carrier Admins who are part of the specified organization
get.description: Returns the list of Carrier Admins who are part of the specified organization

200.description: The Carrier Admins are returned

get.summary: Return the list of Recipient Admins
get.description: Returns the list of Recipient Admins

200.description: The list of Recipient Admins is returned

get.summary: Return the Recipient Admin with the specified userID
get.description: Returns the Recipient Admin with the specified userID

200.description: The Recipient Admin is returned

get.summary: Return the list of Recipient Admins who are part of the specified organization
get.description: Returns the list of Recipient Admins who are part of the specified organization

200.description: The Recipient Admins are returned

get.summary: Return the list of the Recipient Members
get.description: Returns the list of the Recipient Members

200.description: The list of Recipient Members is returned

get.summary: Return the Recipient Member with the specified userID
get.description: Returns the Recipient Member with the specified userID

200.description: The Recipient Admin is returned

get.summary: Return the list of Recipient Members who are part of the specified organization
get.description: Returns the list of Recipient Members who are part of the specified organization

200.description: The Recipient Members are returned

city.description: Provide the name of the city

country.description: Provide the name of the country

latitude.description: Provide the correct latitude in integers

longitude.description: Provide the correct longitude in integers

actualDate.description: Provide an actual date in integers
Provide an actual date in integers

isDamaged.description: Specify if a good is damaged with true or false

ecmrs.description: Provide an array of ecmrs, which will be automatically updated

odoMeterReading.description: Provide ode meter in integer format

CreateECMRs.description: This API creates a new ECMR, or multiple ECMRs. Make sure there is an active transport order, otherwise an ECMR can not be created

owner.description: Provide ID of the Legal Owner organization

source.description: Provide ID of the Compound organization

transporter.description: Provide ID of the Transporter user

carrier.description: Provide ID of the Carrier organization

recipient.description: Provide ID of the Recipient organization

recipientMember.description: Provide ID of the Recipient user

issueDate.description: Provide an issue date in integer format

source.description: The ID of the Compound organization. Make sure to change this if logged in with a different source.

recipient.description: Provide ID of the Recipient organization

ip.description: Unique IP address as a string

timestamp.description: Timestamp as an integer in milliseconds

orderID.description: Specify the unique orderID of the transportOrder

status.description: Selects the open status for new transportOrders

owner.description: The ID of the Legal Owner organization. Make sure to change this if logged in with a different owner.

carrier.description: The ID of the Carrier organization. Make sure to change this if logged in with a different Carrier.

orderRef.description: External reference for legalOwner legacy system

issueDate.description: The date a transportOrder get issued

ecmrID.description: Unique ecmrID number as a string

startDate.description: Start date of the window in UNIX timestamp

endDate.description: End date of the window in UNIX timestamp

vin.description: Unique VIN number as a string

ecmrID.description: Provide an existing ecmrID for an ECMR that needs to be cancelled

orderID.description: Provide an existing orderID for a transportOrder that needs to be cancelled

cancelledBy.description: Optional: provide identity of participant that is about to cancel

success.description: Returns if a login was successful or not

token.description: Returns a unique token that is bound to the user logging in
